text: I Gospod' yeye prinyal yeye khoroshim priyemom, i vozrastil yeye khoroshim rostom, i poruchil yeye Zakarii. Vsyakiy raz, kak Zakariya vkhodil k ney v mikhrab, on nakhodil u neye propitaniye. On skazal: "O Maryam! Otkuda tebe eto?" Ona skazala: "Eto ot Allakha Poistine, Allakh pitayet, kogo pozhelayet, bez scheta
